p:
The quality of royal jelly is determined according to the 10-HDA ratio and this ratio is required to be between 1.4 and 1.8% in a qualified royal jelly. This ratio varies according to the vegetation of the region where the royal jelly is located and the applications in royal jelly harvesting
2
,
3 . The royal jelly contains mostly K, Na, Cu, Fe, Mn and Zn trace elements. Unlike honey, the mineral substance composition in the royal jelly is not affected much by the geographical origin and different plant variety
4 .
